template.description: This template gets the turn around flight events from the Assaia/Chroma API through a polling system, filters the incoming data, transform them to NGSIV2 entities, and sends them to Orion.
template.name: Assaia-NGSI-Orion

config.comments: Segregate all incoming turn around events from flight
Build turn around event entity with NGSIv2 format
Get some entitie attributes for future processing (AODBPrincipalFlightID, TurnAroundID)
Get some entitie attributes for future processing (EventType, ObjectName, ObjectType, Position)
Build some attributes related to the airport entity (EventType, ObjectName, ObjectType, Position)
Polling flight turn around events endpoint from Chroma API every minute

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

value.name: Max Length To Put In Attribute

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

config.comments: Save TurnAroundEvent entity in Orion Context Broker

config.comments: Filter all the flights with AODBPrincipalFlightID and TurnAroundID not null
